#15 19/05

Dear LHP,

It has been a long time since I last stand inside the school yard, looking around for flower petals or feeling the beloved smell of the summer rain.
Sai Gon is raining again, this time harder than ever in my memory. Everyday's way-back-home is long. Summer is no longer summer.
I miss you.

The seniors are graduating in a few days. The stories, the feelings, the actions made, all cause me to recall those days of mine, those beautiful days that I once lived. Life does go on, I guess. And only the heart of human would look back, and sometimes refuse to make its move.

Here I am in my twenties, full of youth and ambitious. Still, I am tired. Tired of staying strong when my best friend falls, tired of trying hard for my team at work, tired of waking up, day by day...

So let me be this weakened girl, and once again backed up by you, LHP. Just sometimes.
18.05.2016 ghuv

#1 04/05/16

From your favorite redhead 
(My god you better love me more after this; I could barely figure out how to write with all these Vietnamese)

Our dearest Presidente, 

Since you were complaining about the random, overly-romanticized, and too-oftenly-overdone writing of those Ivy League people up here, I decided that a certain something should be done. Now, mi amor, you have to understand that it takes a certain kind of recklessness and grit to find my way here and write, and that I love you, dearly. 

I'm sorry. I haven't treated you well, have I? I haven't written to you as much, nor have I embraced you with these scarred hands. 

I'm sorry. I'm scared, H, that this feels so right. And anything that feels right or perfect should never exist in my life.

I was contented, you shit. I was fine with being dull and silent, watching American Dad in the locker room alone and feed myself with Ginsberg's poetry. But no. You just had to come in and change things ha? Invoking nothing but spasms of cravings, outcries for attachments and the unforgiving need to write. Fucking poems. For you. (Sidenote to whoever's reading this, my Viet friend told me that no swearing is allowed. So if needed, do change the "fucking" to "freaking". But freaking bold it.) I'm selfish, mi amor, I don't want to get hurt.  You would leave me anyway, I know, I'm waiting so badly for it. Prove me right, prove that I'm invariably boring and that this is but your sudden interest in redheads, foreigners, whatever. I'm not even pretty for god's sake. 

It's not right for me to be loved, H. It isn't. But why aren't you leaving. 

I'm sorry. Again, and again, for being an obnoxious freaking being to you. But I adore you so dearly. So fucking dearly. 

If you don't intend to leave, let me tell you something, as my confession: I want you to stay. 

Stay with me, read poems with me, teach me Vietnamese, watch Korean drama with me, tell me how to say "yeu" or "nho", be my "anh",  eat Pho with me and let us sit in that room and make fun of vegetarians. Love me and I promise,

I will love you, remind you how loved you are, how strong you are, how well you write, how we are not made to simply be strangers but friends, soulmates, everything. 

Stay, you shit. Stay. 

Your Dearest, 

VM 

p/s: writing this at 1 freaking AM before freaking AP Lit. Appreciate it !

#5. 17/04/2016
From Princeton to Yale 

Waning, the moon is
Mirage, you, and me
Agony, curse decreed
Infinitely asphyxiate me. 

How long? A decennium. The blistering ray of the sun and the cacophonous aubade of that graduating day still besieges my noumenon. The taction of your asomatous Ã©lan vital through your pulchritudinous fingers still aggrandizes my paroxysm, and simultaneously engulf my vivacity. One love, the forbidden apple of Eve and Cleopatra. My Eve, I still relive the supposititiously illusory havens in our synchronized psyches. Your fuchsia, roseating labrum osculates with mine. O' Lord. The vibes. The passion. 

But you, and your impuissant will, that cannot thwart the societal, ostensibly flagtitious ideological darts. You devastated me, with a voiceless tenor. You sunder our maudlin, exotic, erotic ligature. You extirpate our rapture, my raison d'Ãªtre. 

But I bear no malice towards you, my inamorata. I will be lingering here, at Le Hong Phong of ours, to relish your temporal replica, even if it is the last time. 

I still wait for you, my Eve. I crave for our sacrilegious, anathemic love. One Last Time 

Your Cleopatra 

"My mistress' eyes are nothing like the sun; 
Coral is far more red than her lips' red; 
If snow be white, why then her breasts are dun; 
If hairs be wires, black wires grow on her head. 
I have seen roses damask'd, red and white, 
But no such roses see I in her cheeks; 
And in some perfumes is there more delight 
Than in the breath that from my mistress reeks. 
I love to hear her speak, yet well I know 
That music hath a far more pleasing sound; 
I grant I never saw a goddess go; 
My mistress, when she walks, treads on the ground: 
And yet, by heaven, I think my love as rare 
As any she belied with false compare."

hey c:
soo it's been 2,5 months since I received your gift after a couple of months waiting (yeah, I have to admit I had been a bit upset when I saw the other girls' gorgeous drawings - once and then twice and then... ). Besides I thought u guys shouldn't be bothered about me, as no one should.

But um, this is the unofficial day we return the favor. I don't like debts, esp from the ones whom I'm already indebted to so so much in the past even though anyone would have known that tomanly punching Scylla in her hideous face and hissing the terrifying barracuda hiss at the Charybdis are the only two of the things that you guys would've obviously done if there is a friend calling out for you c:

*** In the past couples of months, I have been momentarily ill whenever the 'evil thoughts' streamed into my head and caused some headache. And then there were the usual electron nights and afternoons when I had too much time to think about everything in this world except for protonsâ€¦

Eventually 'when it all comes crashing down, so do I'.
:)

But don't worry, I know where I should always find sanctuary. 
How can I ever forget these heaven-sent encouraging words from yours: 

''For the girl whose determination surpass even the highest mountains.
For the girl who is fierce but also as sweet and calm as a river.
For the girl who takes on failures as challenges, and always triumphs. 

'Fishermatoes' means family and family means no one is left behind WE LOVE YOU NO MATTER WHAT.''
[the original words]

I can't recall how many times and for how long each time I've open my 'the past' drawer and found myself weeping pathetically with the Smiley Greeting Card of yours in my hands as if it was a life belt.

And it truly is. 
I know many have family for their source of comfort and support. 
It's an honor to me to have two. 

Even now when the headaches have disappeared, I've started to listen to a bunch of 1D cute songs, and begun to expect a PE flashmob from you guys seniors, should there be any (---my dearest, you guys have grown up so fast ğŸ˜‚), I still keep it in my 'long-term storage' folder, in my phone and mind so that should I ever break down, I will at least be able to spare myself the painful ordeal of losing the beautiful image of you amazing fishermatoes that I've had.    
 
This is not much but I would like to give you guys  a gazillion bear hugs I've never permitted myself the pleasure of sending you :3

One last thing... :) To the most humble and significant living Star of Bethlehem of mine, I wish you the inconsistency of an average, witty and lively teenager as well as "a zest for life that you have at that age that is so beautiful" - as an up and coming actress has said; the infinitely un-commonplace and mad way of thinking about almost everything in life that you see; and lastly, the valor of the best fighter history ever saw.

From a once-CA girl with lots of lots of bromance love.

"To you, my lovely girlfriend ;)

I think my feelings has chosen the right way, the way to love you. Thank you for letting me go with you at LHP Musical Finale.

When I called you by the time I have just arrived, I heard your voice, the voice I haven't listened since the last time we met. You told me that you were eating dinner, so we  would met each other soon. You know, my heart at that time was beating very fast, and my soul was very happy.

When I saw you with your classmate at the opposite building of LHP Highschool, I said greeting and you did the same thing. Saw you tasting your meal is the happiness thing I have experienced. Your long hair, more and more things from you made me can't concentrate on eating my meal. Hihi

After we had finished our dinner, you went with the girl talked with you through your conversation, and I walked with my bestfriend. You concentrated on watching your class was dancing on the stage, and I was recording it next to Mr.Phong Hotboy, Hehe. I met my friends and talked with them and encouraged them to do their best when performed on it.

After all, when we could see beautiful moon clearly, I called your name behind your back, and â€¦ your friends. They stared at me, smiled with me and I was very embarrassed. You spinned one half  circle, looked me gently, jumped down slowly, said goodbye with your friends and â€¦ I took you go.

We walked, we talked, we were finding a silent place for our time together although the show hasn't finished yet. And we â€¦ stopped walking at the place near "Where the love begins" :D
You and me, side by side and the silent was around us. I was talkative before but at that time, I was paralyzed. A few minutes passed, I looked at your face and you did the same. I want that time is endless, you know...

We started talking about the special things for teacher of class, about the moon, about the show, and about our aims in this year. Just talking and talking to prolong our time together. This is the first time I have talked with the girl I love as couple.

Memories with you will always be in my heart. It will never fade. 
I will wait for a year
I will study harder and do my best to pass the National University Entrance Examination.
I will be FTU-er

Now, Studying is the first priority of us. So â€¦ Just Fighting with it !
Hope you can achieve the best score on your Next Speciman Test.

See you this LHP's Festival 2014

I'm always with you...
Love you,

From Gemini to Sagittarius :)
"

"[I would be very grateful if admin can upload this confession for me. I'm not a LHP-er but she is, and I hope that she could read this confession. I cannot send this message directly to her, hence this page is the only place I can reply. If it is too long, can you split it into comments inside the post for me? My apology for posting in English, but I cannot control my emotions when writing in Vietnamese]

Thanks for sending the message saying happy birthday to me
I know it is hard for you to speak out those words
But somehow, I have expected that message from you
And somehow, I could have guessed the content inside it
A little bit hesitant, a little bit sad, and lots of meanings
I know you want to say a lot to me
But for me, that is enough
I never feel uncomfortable about you
Nor your words, your actions
Neither do I consider you as a stranger
Yet, you are someone very special
Deep down inside my heart
That I have tried my best
To conceal my feelings for the last 3 years
After 3 years, my feelings for youâ€¦ are still the same
It was a great effort
To constrain myself from looking for your news
Checking your FB everyday to know how you are doing
It was very painful but I finally did it
I don't want to interfere into your relationship
I just wish that you would be happy with your special someone

Yes, don't worry
I'm working very hard
To have new achievements, reaching new heights
It's very competitive here
But I will never give up
I will always keep my promise
I will let you see
How well your boy is doing
It is okay
3 years have passed
And I get used to this environment
I familiarized myself with this loneliness
But I try to keep my mind optimistic
And going aheadâ€¦

I also have something to tell you
You still look exactly the same like 3 years ago
The newest avatar is very pretty
But putting your face in the middle of it is not okay :(
You look good in that white blouse
Try to be a good doctor, promise?
I still remember a little girl
Used to dream to be a doctor
Who would take care of the children

Ha ha, now when I have time
To recall my memory
About me and you
All of them are very childish
I was mistaken it as love
It is not love
Just some weird feelings
But somehow, I love your personality
Well, you fit perfectly into my ideal gf

That's all I want to say
Hope that you will see this message
I will not reply to your messages directly
I think it's better for both of us
Both of us find peace now, right :)?

Tomorrow I will go back to Singapore
This time maybe a long time
Before I can return to Vietnam
Hope that my little girl is doing well here
And be happy with her bf

One more thing
Sometimes, I still dream of you

Bye :)
PS: SHMILY"
